Key Match Events: Lockie Ferguson was named Player of the Match
New Zealand won the match by 8 wickets with 43 balls remaining
Post-Match Reflections: Lockie Ferguson was named the Man of the Match
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the MA Chidambaram Stadium, Chepauk, Chennai
The match was a day-night 50-over match
Others: The match was part of the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023-24
The series points were awarded to New Zealand 2 and Bangladesh 0
